tool_description: Gets a collection of recipes from the FoodNetwork site.
name: RecipeAPI
title: RecipeAPI

api_list.name: Get Recipe Summary
api_list.description: Returns the ingredients and method to create the specified recipe, using the "recipeLink" property value.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://recipeapi1.p.rapidapi.com/RecipeSearch/RecipeSummary/oxtails-3678919"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "recipeapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://recipeapi1.p.rapidapi.com/RecipeSearch/RecipeSummary/{link}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "recipeapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Recipe By Name (Paginate)
api_list.description: Returns the specified page listing of recipes that contains a common name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://recipeapi1.p.rapidapi.com/RecipeSearch/oxtail/2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "recipeapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://recipeapi1.p.rapidapi.com/RecipeSearch/{name}/{pagenum}"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "recipeapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Recipe By Name
api_list.description: Returns a list of recipes that contains a common name.
